ValidationRule.description: Enter value for the field Quote Total is Greater than $5,000 for Quoted record type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(($Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator'),($RecordType.Name = 'Quotes'),(!ISCHANGED(OwnerId__c)),(ISBLANK(TEXT(Quote_Total_Gtr_Than_5000__c))), (ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Done') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Completed')), ( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Origin , 'Web') && ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Done') && ($Profile.Name == 'Portal API User - RFQ (US)' || $Profile.Name =='Portal API User - Self-Registration' || $Profile.Name =='Portal Interfaces App User' || $Profile.Name =='Portal User - Self-Registration' || $Profile.Name =='Portal Hon Adminstrator' || $Profile.Name =='Portal API User - MCORE' || $Profile.Name =='Portal API User RO Automation'))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a value for the field named Quote Total Greater Than $5,000
